definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: The weather became so bad that they had to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 天氣變得很壞，他們只好原路而歸了。

sentences.english: It delivers value more slowly to everyone. Invariably.
sentences.chinese: 這會讓交付價值變得更慢，對所有客戶都會變慢。

sentences.english: Entire malls will become ghost towns.
sentences.chinese: 所有的大型商場都將變得門可羅雀。

sentences.english: They become too attached to the computer screen. It isn't healthy.
sentences.chinese: 他們變得太黏在計算機屏幕前，這很不健康。

sentences.english: They promised her she would soon be rich beyond her wildest dreams.
sentences.chinese: 他們向她保證很快她就會變得超乎想像的富有。

sentences.english: He says the new facility may make future tests more realistic.
sentences.chinese: 他說，新的設施可能使未來的測試變得更現實。

sentences.english: You feel you have something more to live for.
sentences.chinese: 你感覺生活變得更有意義和豐富多彩。

sentences.english: The libtard morons got change but for the worse.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義白癡們改變了，但卻變得更糟。

sentences.english: After that the struggle inside the party grew more acute.
sentences.chinese: 在那以後，黨內的鬥爭變得更加尖銳。

sentences.english: And what other ways can we make our real world more like these fantasy worlds?
sentences.chinese: 我們又能怎樣把現實世界變得像那夢中的國度呢？

sentences.english: The feedback will become so strong it destroys the wormhole.
sentences.chinese: 反饋變得很強大而毀壞了蟲洞。

sentences.english: Her shriek was dulled by the loud crash of thunder.
sentences.chinese: 她的尖叫聲在震耳的雷聲中變得低沉了。

sentences.english: The tools of media will become more easy to use and more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 媒體工具會變得更加容易操作，更加便宜。

sentences.english: And when it was made plain who Kino was, the doctor grew stern and judicious at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 弄清楚誰是吉納後，醫生變得嚴肅認真而又明智起來。

sentences.english: This eclipse will be difficult for a number of reasons.
sentences.chinese: 因爲幾個原因，這個月蝕將變得有些困難。

sentences.english: That has since calmed down and the markets have gotten even quieter lately.
sentences.chinese: 此後市場逐漸平靜下來，最近已變得更爲平靜了。
